microservices.name: tkgone
microservices.options:
options:
  kind: StatefulSet
  containers:
  - build:
      args: {}
      dockerfileTemplateArgs: {}
      repo: https://code.aliyun.com/sreworks_public/mirror.git
      dockerfileTemplate: Dockerfile
      ciAccount: public
      ciToken: public
      repoPath: saas/search/api/tkg-one
      branch: master
    name: tkgone
  env:
  - CONTAINER_IP_LIST_TKGONE
  - CONTAINER_IP_LIST
  - ELASTICSEARCH_HOST
  - ELASTICSEARCH_PORT
  - DB_USER
  - DB_HOST
  - DB_PASSWORD
  - DB_PORT
  - REDIS_HOST
  - REDIS_PORT
  - REDIS_PASSWORD
  - REDIS_DB
  - NACOS_ENDPOINT
  - NACOS_NAMESPACE
  - DB_NAME
  - ELASTICSEARCH_PASSWORD
  - DATA_ES_PASSWORD
  - ELASTICSEARCH_USER
  - DATA_ES_HOST
  - DATA_ES_PORT
  - DATA_ES_USER
  initContainers:
  - build:
      args: {}
      dockerfileTemplateArgs: {}
      repo: https://code.aliyun.com/sreworks_public/mirror.git
      dockerfileTemplate: Dockerfile-db-migration
      ciAccount: public
      ciToken: public
      repoPath: saas/search/api/tkg-one
      branch: master
    name: db-migration
